messages.title: Building a stronger economy and fairer society in Sheffield
messages.content: In government, Nick and the Lib Dems have prioritised building a stronger economy and fairer society. In Sheffield, Nick has backed businesses, supported schools and is accountable to you.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cut less than the Conservatives and borrow less than Labour - but still balance the books by 2018.
Protecting school budgets and helping every child get a good start in life.
At least £8 billion extra real funding by 2020 and guaranteed equal care for mental health.

mentions.candidate: Nick Clegg is backing You in Sheffield Hallam
mentions.tacticalSituation: The bookies have Labour as the clear favourite here in Sheffield Hallam. The seat predictors at the Guardian and the Daily Mirror both say Labour win. Only Nick can beat Labour here.

issues.economy: Cut less than the Conservatives and borrow less than Labour - but still balance the books by 2018.
issues.education: Protecting school budgets and helping every child get a good start in life.
issues.health: At least £8 billion extra real funding by 2020 and guaranteed equal care for mental health.

images.caption: Nick with apprentices in a local factory

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet focuses on Nick Clegg’s personal backing for the constituents and highlights the Lib Dems’ role in the coalition government. It positions Nick Clegg as the only candidate who can beat Labour in Sheffield Hallam.
